TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIAccessibilityZoomType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration that specifies what elements (currently, only the insertion point) is involved in automatic accessibility zooming.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIAccessibilityZoomType InsertionPoint = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The system zoom type is the text insertion point.
